description: This file is a C header file defining internal API prototypes for the Data Model Layer, specifically for the DSL Home Model Implementation's Object Controller component. It includes function declarations related to object instantiation, validation, and parameter access, indicating its role in internal API exposure within the codebase.

methods.name: DslhObjcoGetInsContext
methods.description: Retrieves the instance context handle for the object controller.

methods.name: DslhObjcoCheckInstance
methods.description: Checks whether the object instance is valid.

methods.name: DslhObjcoCheckParamExistence
methods.description: Checks if a specified parameter exists within the object.

methods.name: DslhObjcoCheckParamWritability
methods.description: Checks if a specified parameter is writable.

methods.name: DslhObjcoValidateHierarchyInterface
methods.description: Validates the hierarchy interface of the object for a given parameter and type.

methods.name: DslhObjcoEngage
methods.description: Engages or initializes the object controller.

methods.name: DslhObjcoValidate
methods.description: Validates the object state or configuration.

methods.name: DslhObjcoCommit
methods.description: Commits changes made to the object.

methods.name: DslhObjcoRollback
methods.description: Rolls back changes to revert to the previous state.

methods.name: DslhObjcoGetParamValueByName
methods.description: Retrieves the value of a parameter by its name.

methods.name: DslhObjcoGetBulkParamValue
methods.description: Retrieves multiple parameter values in bulk given an array of parameter names.
